item.title: Someone who can make Sprites or edit current ones
item.dc:creator: @imagplaya imagplaya
item.description:
@imagplaya wrote:

I know the two best sprite makers ill email u when I get my laptop because I have to teach u how to use it its a paint thing like u look up something then u add it and it appears on the page (for example I’d look for rune plate then is change it red maybe add wings and horns and a little symbol then I’d copy it to 4d cinema and add animtion as a special then copy the code from 4d cinema not paint because if u get it from 4d cinema not only do u have armor but u have better graphics and a spec
